tier_level.description: Tier level for the required metadata for microscopy experiments
tier_level.title: Microscopy Tier Level

description.description: A short description of the labeling path
description.title: Description

ch03_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 3
ch03_light_source_model.title: Ch03 light source model

ch04_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 3
ch04_light_source_model.title: Ch04 light source model

ch02_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 2
ch02_light_source_model.title: Ch02 light source model

microscope_model.description: Manufacturer and model of the instrument used for imaging
microscope_model.title: Microscope model

ch04_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 3
ch04_light_source_type.title: Ch04 light source type

ch01_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 1
ch01_light_source_model.title: Ch01 light source model

ch01_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 1
ch01_light_source_type.title: Ch01 light source type

ch00_light_source_model.description: Manufacturer and model number of the light source on channel 0
ch00_light_source_model.title: Ch00 light source model

ch03_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch03
ch03_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch03 center wavelength

image_t_step.description: the time step between images, e.g. 2 sec, 100 millisec
image_t_step.title: Image time step

ch01_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch01
ch01_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch01 center wavelength

ch02_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 2
ch02_light_source_type.title: Ch02 light source type

microscope_effective_magnification.description: Total effective magnification, with relay or other additional magnification
microscope_effective_magnification.title: Microscope magnification (X)

image_channel_encoding.description: Order of time, z, and channel frames
image_channel_encoding.title: Image channel encoding

ch04_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch03
ch04_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch04 center wavelength

objective_magnification.description: Magnification as stated on the objective
objective_magnification.title: Objective magnification (X)

objective_model.description: Manufacturer and model of the microscope objective
objective_model.title: Objective model

ch03_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 3
ch03_light_source_type.title: Ch03 light source type

image_pixel_size.description: the dimensions of pixels in the image
image_pixel_size.title: Image pixel size (µm)

ch00_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch00
ch00_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch00 center wavelength

ch02_light_source_center_wl.description: Center wavelength of the light source on ch02
ch02_light_source_center_wl.title: Ch02 center wavelength

ch00_light_source_type.description: Type of the light source for channel 0
ch00_light_source_type.title: Ch00 light source type

objective_designation.description: Please indicate if there is a special purpose for the objective(e.g. TIRF, …)
objective_designation.title: Objective special designation

___ch01_integration_time.title: Ch01 integration time (millisec)

___ch02_detector_model.title: Ch02 detector model

___ch03_integration_time.title: Ch03 integration time (millisec)
